# File lib/json/editor.rb, line 1281
1281:       def start(encoding = nil) # :yield: window
1282:         encoding ||= 'utf8'
1283:         Gtk.init
1284:         @window = Editor::MainWindow.new(encoding)
1285:         @window.icon_list = [ Editor.fetch_icon('json') ]
1286:         yield @window if block_given?
1287:         @window.show_all
1288:         Gtk.main
1289:       end
